statements: SELECT * FROM system_events
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM system_events WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN'
SELECT event_date, event_type, source_ip, destination_ip FROM system_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_id, description FROM system_events WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1'
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM system_events GROUP BY event_type
SELECT * FROM system_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) FROM system_events GROUP BY event_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT event_type, description FROM system_events WHERE event_type = 'login' AND source_ip = '192.168.1.1'
SELECT * FROM system_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY event_date
SELECT event_type, source_ip, destination_ip FROM system_events WHERE source_ip = destination_ip
SELECT * FROM system_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM system_events WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) FROM system_events GROUP BY event_type
SELECT * FROM system_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%'
SELECT log_date, log_type FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC
SELECT * FROM system_events WHERE event_id = 15;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM system_events WHERE event_id > 10 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM system_events WHERE event_type = 'Error';
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM system_events WHERE event_type = 'Warning' AND event_id < 20 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE log_type = 'Unauthorized Access' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_events;
SELECT event_name, event_id, timestamp FROM system_events WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_description, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT investigation_name, investigator_id, start_time, end_time FROM security_investigations WHERE investigation_id = 3;
SELECT event_id, event_name, timestamp, user_id FROM system_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%error%'
SELECT * FROM system_events WHERE event_name = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, user_id FROM system_events WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_description, log_time, source_ip FROM network_logs WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND log_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_time DESC;

SELECT investigation_name, start_time, end_time FROM security_investigations WHERE investigator_id = 98765 AND start_time BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC, investigation_name DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, user_id, timestamp FROM system_events WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND user_id IN (555, 666, 777) ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_events
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM system_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM system_events WHERE event_type = 'error' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_description FROM security_logs WHERE log_type = 'alert' LIMIT 10
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_timestamp FROM forensics_analysis
SELECT * FROM system_events WHERE event_type = 'DB Backup';
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE log_type IN ('Login Attempt', 'Access Denied') ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, source_ip FROM network_activity WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_timestamp FROM forensics_analysis WHERE analysis_notes LIKE '%vulnerability%' ORDER BY analysis_timestamp ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_timestamp FROM forensics_analysis WHERE analysis_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01' ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_events;
SELECT event_description, event_type FROM system_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_details FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_timestamp FROM forensic_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'Malware';
SELECT report_type, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM investigation_reports GROUP BY report_type ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM system_events WHERE event_type='Error' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM investigation_reports WHERE report_timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND report_timestamp < '2021-12-31';
SELECT incident_type, count(*) AS incident_count FROM security_incidents GROUP BY incident_type ORDER BY incident_count DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_timestamp FROM forensic_analysis WHERE analysis_type IN ('Type A', 'Type B') ORDER BY analysis_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
